html:
Repetitive day schedule
Is what I know now
The digital bell
Just started ringing
Gates of hell are open
But an angel in reach
Gold and diamonds
Seem to be enough
I can talk to people
About birds and Sunday soup
But when it comes to life
They hangs up
Repetitive day schedule
Is what I know now
Itâ€™s not against the law
No one can do anything
title: Bell
